meta.title: Patches & Bling — Holographic Symbols · Jackets · Vests
meta.description: Mix and match patches, metals, and bling for jackets, vests, hats. Holographic symbols. Reno Vibelandia · Rat Pack · WINK! · SING! · BBHE · Content episode tags.
